headline: Assessing Becton Dickinson (BDX) Valuation After Recent Share Moves And Business Separation Plans
summary: Becton Dickinson (BDX) has been drawing attention after recent share performance that includes a small daily decline and mixed moves over the past week, month and past three months, prompting investors to reassess the medical supplier. See our latest analysis for Becton Dickinson. At a share price of $201.52, Becton Dickinson’s recent 7.9% 90 day share price return contrasts with a 12.7% decline in 1 year total shareholder return. This suggests shorter term momentum while longer term returns...
